message.content: This question requires knowledge about the weather conditions on a clear day. On a clear day, there is no rain or impending bad weather, so it is a good opportunity to enjoy outdoor activities like riding a bike. Option (B) is incorrect because bringing an umbrella is not necessary on a clear day. Option (C) is also incorrect as wearing a coat is not required on a clear day. Option (D) is unnecessary, as staying inside is not required on a clear day.

Option (D) is incorrect because staying inside is not necessary when the weather is clear and pleasant.
